MESSAGE_ERROR_INPUT_KEYWORD: Please enter a keyword to search for podcasts

MESSAGE_INVALID_PODCAST_URL: There is an error in the podcast RSS feed URL.
MESSAGE_INVALID_PODCAST_FORMAT: Podcast RSS feed format error or unsupported format.

CONFIG.TITLE: Podcast Configuration
CONFIG.ADD_PODCAST_NOTE: Note: http(s) podcast RSS feed url
CONFIG.DELETE_PODCAST_DESCRIPTION: Select a podcast item to delete from the registered podcast list.
CONFIG.ADD_PODCAST_DESCRIPTION: If you want to manually add a podcast that is not in the search, please enter the podcast RSS link URL.
CONFIG.MAX_EPISODES_DESCRIPTION: Specifies the maximum number of episodes viewed when you getting podcast. The larger the maximum number, the longer it takes to get podcast.
CONFIG.SELECT_PODCAST_COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION: Please select a region to search for podcasts.
CONFIG.SEARCH_PODCAST_DESCRIPTION: Enter a keyword for a podcast to be searched in the podcast directory. After the search is complete, select the podcast from the search results.
CONFIG.SEARCH_PODCAST_NOTE: Enter keywords for podcasts to search
CONFIG.SEARCH_LIST_NOTE: Please select a search result from the podcast.
CONFIG.SUPPORT_KOREAN_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Go to the 'Donaricano' korean support site
CONFIG.SUPPORT_FOREIGNER_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Go to the 'PayPal.Me' outside korea support site
CONFIG.SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION: Please support this podcast plugin. Thanks.
